author: Life in the 1800s
description: This video brings President Abraham Lincoln (Feb. 12, 1809 – Apr. 15, 1865) to life using AI based entirely on his original, authentic photographs — no artist’s sketches, no modern recreations. I started each clip using only the real photo of Lincoln himself, carefully adding movement while keeping the scene authentic in order to show what he and those around him might have looked like in motion.
title: President Abraham Lincoln Brought to Life With AI (Using Only Real Photos)
